match.authors: Marc'Aurelio Ranzato, S. Chopra, Michael Auli, Wojciech Zaremba
match.title: Sequence Level Training with Recurrent Neural Networks

citance.context: Prior work, taking inspiration from Reinforcement Learning (RL), has aimed at inducing autoregressive models to optimize global objectives using task specific rewards such as BLEU and ROUGE for Machine Translation and Summarization
